body:
## What's Changed

### Fixed

* Fix `TEST_PREMATURE_EXIT_FILE` not being removed in `macos_test_runner` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2735


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/4.0.0...4.0.1

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases

## MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "4.0.1", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

## Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_apple",
    sha256 = "b28822cb81916fb544119f5533de010cc67ec6a789f2e7d0fc19d53bfcbb8285",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/releases/download/4.0.1/rules_apple.4.0.1.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:extras.bzl",
    "swift_rules_extra_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_extra_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's changed

### Breaking changes

* `.swiftinterface` files are no longer provided by default unless the underlying swift_library uses `features = ["swift.emit_swiftinterface"]` or `library_evolution = True`.
* Removed `experimental_mixed_language_library` rule, users should use **rules_swift**'s `mixed_language_library` rule instead.

### Fixed 

* Fix to only generate Swift interfaces if a build graph for an XCFramework rule is found to contain non-system Swift modules. by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2715
* Fix issue with codesign not supporting bundles that have spaces by @adincebic in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2732

### Removed

* Remove `no-remote` when there arenâ€™t any codesign commands by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2682
* Remove `One of the two will be used` grep by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2724
* Remove experimental mixed language library rule by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2730

### Added

* Add a new series of boundary checks to keep users informed of how to resolve issues with 3P static library SDK rules (such as apple_static_xcframework) caused by making avoid_deps too all-encompassing. by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2716
* Utilize `TEST_PREMATURE_EXIT_FILE` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2725
* Ability to explicitly specify output files in apple_core_data_model rule by @daltonclaybrook in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2727
* Support latest rules_swift by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2729

### Changed

* `*_build_test`: Don't allow targets to be empty. by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2719
* Disable include scanning to work around issue with GrepIncludes actions by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2720
* Mark the output bundle's root folder permissions as 0o755 as the user when tree artifact bundling is active, for parity with the output bundle generated by legacy bundling. by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2721
* Mark provisioning_profiles_repository_extension as reproducible by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2731

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2731
* @daltonclaybrook made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2727

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.22.0...4.0.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases

## MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "4.0.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

## Workspace Snippet

```bzl

    name = "build_bazel_rules_apple",
    sha256 = "70b0fb2aec1055c978109199bf58ccb5008aba8e242f3305194045c271ca3cae",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/releases/download/4.0.0/rules_apple.4.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:extras.bzl",
    "swift_rules_extra_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_extra_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed

* add rules_shell as a dependency in bzlmod to fix HEAD builds by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2712
* [testing] expose the xcresult bundle to post action binaries for processing by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2711
* Tests: Allow post_action to determine exit status by @kapoorlakshya in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2713

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.21.1...3.22.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases

## MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "3.22.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

```bzl
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/releases/download/3.22.0/rules_apple.3.22.0.tar.gz",

    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",

apple_rules_dependencies()

    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",

swift_rules_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed
* Fix test_coverage_manifest on macos_test_runner by @marcelofabri in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2672
* Relax rsync path for permissions workaround in macOS 15.4+ by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2710


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.21.0...3.21.1

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases

## MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "3.21.1", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

## Workspace Snippet

```bzl

    "swift_rules_dependencies",

swift_rules_dependencies()

    "swift_rules_extra_dependencies",

    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",

apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed
* xctrunner: Fix provider of platform type by @kapoorlakshya in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2680
* fix: remove strings from provides by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2685
* Fix path for XCUIAutomation.framework on Xcode 16.3 by @marcelofabri in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2684
* Add `env_inherit` to `*_{ui,unit}_test` rules by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2668
* Alias config_settings to apple_support by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2673
* Fix CI with Xcode 16.2 by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2679
* Use `TEST_TMPDIR` where possible by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2686
* Fix simulators missing by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2696
* Update apple_support by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2695
* Remove upstream get_cpu usage by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2670
* Remove bazel 6.x only flags by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2678
* remove `--nocheck_visibility` flag from .bazelrc by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2692
* Use bools for boolean attrs instead of ints by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2691
* Test using --local_test_jobs=2 only in presubmit.yml by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2701
* Deduplicate linker inputs in merged linking contexts by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2689
* adopt rules_python, remove use of native python rules by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2693
* Allow only keeping `.xcresults` for failed tests by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2662
* Pass through `TEST_PREMATURE_EXIT_FILE` to simulators by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2688
* Always link XCTestSwiftSupport into Swift test targets by @jflan-dd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2697
* Include `env` variables in the runner as well by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2704
* Add `collect_code_coverage` attribute to tests by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2705

## New Contributors
* @marcelofabri made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2684
* @jflan-dd made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2697

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.20.1...3.21.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases

```bzl
apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed

* Fix non-`$should_use_xcodebuild` path of test runner by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2666

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.20.0...3.20.1

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases.

## What's Changed

* Add `additional_linker_inputs` support for apple_test_assembler.bzl by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2656
* Add `apple.codesign_frameworks_without_provisioning_profile` feature by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2605
* Add a few more `exec_compatible_with` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2661
* Add xctrunner rule to create test bundles by @kapoorlakshya in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2529
* Allow collecting `.profdata` from test runs by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2665
* Support pre- and post- actions in `ios_xctestrun_runner` by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2649
* Add swift-testing support to the xctest runner by @ed-irl in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2554

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.19.1...3.20.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases.


## What's Changed
* Fix Bazel 8 crash when generating dsym or linkmap paths by @jpsim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2651
* Fix device families for visionOS by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2653
* Add `manual` tag to test bundle rule by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2655


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.19.0...3.19.1

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases.

## What's Changed

* Default test `exec_compatible_with` to macOS by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2646
* Remove comments relating to Tulsi by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2648
* Add ability to not error when no tests are run by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2650

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.18.0...3.19.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 7.x LTS and 8.x LTS releases.

* Cherry-pick Swift toolchain changes from upstream by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2643

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.17.1...3.18.0

## What's Changed

* Mark non_module_deps extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2639
* Update `ios_xctestrun_runner.device_type` default by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2642
* Exclude swiftinterfaces contained within dSYMs from a framework's `swift_interface_imports` by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2640

## What's Changed

## What's Changed
* Adds Core ML and Metal processing info to resources.md by @jiawen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2624
* Add `mixed_language_library` to mixed language suggestion by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2627
* Revert "Embed frameworks in `ios_message_extension` (#1706)" by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2631
* Fix bundling error in examples/ios/HelloWorldSwift by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2632
* Escape backslashes in example build label regex by @pswaminathan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2629
* Add support for `.provisionprofile` in `local_provisioning_profile` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2634
* Propagate dSYM bundles discovered within imported dynamic xcframeworks by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2625
* Propagate `AppleFrameworkImportInfo` from iOS extensions by @aaronsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2633
* Support bundling live activities extensions with ios_app_clip by @adincebic in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2630
* Make hmaptool deterministic by @vakhidbetrakhmadov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2637

## What's Changed

* Add proper support for **rules_swift** `mixed_language_library` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2580
* Stop using rule(output_to_genfiles = True) by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2586
* Fix `ios_xctestrun_runner` not updating binary on delta updates by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2590
* Fix nesting of bundles with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2588
* Fix nested resources (e.g. `.momd` directories) with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2592
* Always process `Info.plist` files with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2591
* Expose a new `AppleDeviceTestRunnerInfo` provider from device-based test runners by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2581

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.11.2...3.12.0

## What's Changed

* Fix apple_static_xcframework rule to exclude bundles of dependencies marked as avoid_deps by @sewerynplazuk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2541
* Add `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @maxwellE in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2504
* Allow to opt-out from library evolution by @sewerynplazuk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2484
* Support Linux with `dossier_codesigning_reader.py` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2539
* Remove j2objc_dead_code_pruner from rules_apple by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2552
* Fix processing of `infoplists` in `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2565
* Fix `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` to process all types by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2567

```bzl
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()
```

```bzl
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed

* Do not bundle .abi.json files by @vakhidbetrakhmadov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2513
* Make cc_info_dylibs_partial handle only .dylib files. (#2516) by @hiroyuki-komatsu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2517
* Only insert libXCTestBundleInject.dylib for unit tests by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2530
* Use devicectl to install and launch *_application targets on a physical device by @CognitiveDisson in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2527
* Use `openssl` outside of Linux in `local_provisioning_profile_finder.py` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2522
* Fix `_fallback_srcs` check by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2521

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.8.0...3.9.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

* Add support for alternate app icons in UIKit via actool in Xcode 14+ (first introduced in 13) by @vakhidbetrakhmadov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2505
* Add `implementation_deps` to `_FRAMEWORK_PROVIDERS_ASPECT_ATTRS` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2508
* Allow `GenerateCodesigningDossier` to run in a sandbox and remotely by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2509
* Add use_runfiles aspect_hint to include runfiles for specific cc_librâ€¦ by @gkoreman in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2479
* Fix bad docc argument for multiple symbol graphs by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2511

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.7.0...3.8.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

* Update header style in release notes template by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2481
* Fix ios_xctestrun_runner with Xcode 16 by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2469
* Correct incorrect skylib import in test runner tests by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2482
* Fix make var tests in ios_xctestrun_runner_unit_test by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2483
* Update to rules_swift 2.0.0 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2486
* Remove BCR fixed releaser config by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2489
* Re-add fixed releaser by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2491
* Fix app intents with Xcode 15.3+ by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2418
* Use `assertEqual` instead of `assertEquals` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2493
* Update DocC for rules_swift 2.1.0 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2487
* Upgrade to Xcode 15.4 from 15.2 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2494
* Upgrade rules_swift to latest 2.x version by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2492
* Skip `ios_test_runner_ui_test` which is failing in CI by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2496
* Increase `ios_coverage_test` size to `large` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2498
* Remove explicit repo name loading local bzl files by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2485
* Sort load statements per buildifier 6.4.0 by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2499
* Use buildifier 6.4.0 for improved load sorting by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2500


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.6.0...3.7.0


This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

### Breaking Changes

- "Make" variables are now expanded inside of values in the `env` dictionary on test rules: #2476
  - If you previously used `env` like this: `env = ["$SOME_OTHER_VAR"]` you will now need to use `env = ["$$SOME_OTHER_VAR"]`   

### Other Changes

* Added support for the `--hosting-base-path` argument to `docc_archive`: #2455
* Added support for bundling dylib deps from `CcInfo`: #2473
* Added support for both pre-2.0 and post-2.0 **rules_swift** when using Blzmod: #2480
* Changed `.xctestrun` key `BAZEL_TEST_PRODUCT_MODULE_NAME`: #2454
* Updated `docc_archive` to support `deps` and `data`: #2450
* You can now nest `.app` bundles when using tree artifacts: #2449
* Fixed broken URL for platforms repo version 0.0.9: #2452
* Fixed provider type checking for `AppleDynamicFrameworkProvider` migration: #2453

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.
